events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but received the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for a return and money back.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong jacket size and would like a refund. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for a smooth refund process?
My order number is 789456123. The jacket is new and still has the tags attached. It is packed just like you sent it.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a prepaid return label for you to send the jacket back. Once we receive it, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Great, that sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to send the jacket back. We aim to finalize your refund promptly once the item arrives.
Just checking in to confirm that your return shipment was received and your refund was processed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for your patience and feel free to contact us anytime if you have other questions.
